{"name":"Dataflow3450_upendar_v2_8306","description":"ICF requirements","version":0,"livyServerId":0,"components":[{"udfNames":[],"componentId":0,"componentName":"startComponent","tableName":"","category":"Start","componentType":"UDF","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":0,"dependencies":[],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.UDFComponent","excludeNotification":"N"},{"code":"import pprint
import pandas as pd

# output dataset name
source_meta_data_name = "excel_meta_data"


# input file paths
source_file_path = "/home/datagaps/upendar/excel_files/sample2.xls"




df_dict = pd.read_excel(source_file_path, sheet_name=None)

final_list = []
c=1
for sheet_name, dataframe in df_dict.items():
    for col, col_type in dataframe.dtypes.items():
        final_list.append({"id":c, "sheet_name": sheet_name, "column_name": col, "column_type": col_type.name})
        c+=1



source_meta_data = spark.createDataFrame(final_list)
source_meta_data = source_meta_data.select("id", "sheet_name", "column_name", "column_type")

source_meta_data.createOrReplaceTempView(source_meta_data_name)
print("\n")

source_meta_data.show()","kind":"pyspark","dataSourceId":0,"componentId":3,"componentName":"excel meta
